6000.title: General Office
6000.desc: The working space of Aether Gazer's General Office, equipped with a highly efficient standard processing system.

6001.title: Twilight Pearl
6001.desc:
A premium business yacht that set Valleyrand Group back a pretty penny, it was later transferred to Aether Gazer and is often used for business negotiations.

<color=#939393>Note: "Lullaby, for a stranded heart" is the recommended background music for this scene.
You can switch the soundtrack using the button below.</color>
6001.unlock_description: Obtain by participating in Banquet Invitation event

6003.title: VIP Care
6003.desc:
After the first aid lecture ends, Kuninotokotachi has you remain in the ward.
"Looks like you could use a little one-on-one nursing demonstration. Shall I show you how it's done?"

6004.title: Red Pavilion Whispers
6004.desc:
After returning from a visit to an old tomb, Lingguang hopes you can stay a little while longer.
—"You know... I'm only wearing this outfit for you. After tonight, it's going back in the closet... and it's staying there."

6005.title: See You Again
6005.desc:
After a fun day out, Zhiming seems somewhat reluctant to take you to the water's edge and fulfill the promise he just lost on the bet.
"Stay close to me... but not that close! Yes, that should be fine... Okay..."

6006.title: Untouchable
6006.desc:
It's the trill of the phoenix flute, the shadows of the lanterns, your laughter as it rings out above the hustle and bustle of the city.
"I'm just tired—it feels like you've been dragging me around all day. What is it you're expecting, exactly?"

6007.title: Courtyard Echoes
6007.desc: The afternoon sun, tipsy wind, and intoxicating fragrance of flowers. This piece is an unforgettable and poignant commemoration of us.

6008.title: Have A Dance With Me?
6008.desc: This dance is just for you, Admin. The figure is graceful and smells faintly of orchids. It's hard to ascertain whether this is a moment of serenity, or just all a dream.

6009.title: Time to Relax
6009.desc: The chance encounter in the elevator has shown people a different side to Gengchen. Maybe tailor-made clothes are never as good as we want them to be?

6010.title: Moment of Panic
6010.desc: I'm always very organized with work, but for some reason I always make mistakes whenever you're nearby. I didn't know you panicked like that too.

6011.title: Sleepwalker
6011.desc: As night falls, Admin comes across a girl immersed in a sweet dream. In the silent twilight, the only thing that moves is time.

6012.title: That First Glimmer of Light
6012.desc: Never-seen-before landscapes, unfamiliar shores... It's all a bit overwhelming for a young lady. What's Admin up to this time?

6013.title: Gentle Echo
6013.desc:
It's a scene Poseidon has always loved, and you're the only one she wants to share it with.
Let's turn that summer into the best of memories.

6014.title: Amid Moonlight
6014.desc: As the evening breeze wafted through Selene's hair, this small world felt calm and quiet yet bursting with meaning. The waves were as gentle as the moonlit sky, while the moon seemed to be gazing back at her.

6015.title: Maiden's Daydream
6015.desc: The young lady had purchased a drink to pass the time waiting for the Admin to get back, but for some reason, whenever she was with the Admin, the pace of her steps always seemed to get disrupted...

6100.title: Command Center Lobby
6100.desc: The Aether Gazer Command Center Lobby is where Division Nine conducts its combat intel analysis and calculations, and it's here that the Admin often carries out preliminary operational planning.
